org.apache.ambari.server.controller.internal

Class BaseClusterRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.controller.internal.BaseClusterRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TopologyRequest
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProvisionClusterRequest, ScaleClusterRequest

    public abstract class BaseClusterRequest
extends Object
implements TopologyRequest
    Provides common cluster request functionality.

        protected void validateHostPredicateProperties(String predicate)

        Validate that all properties specified in the predicate are valid for the Host resource.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
